step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting in a comfortable position! Focus on gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.
You're doing well with the circular motion. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more relaxed as you roll your shoulders.
Excellent! You completed the repetitions. Remember to inhale deeply when pulling your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow.
